rules: Remove one letter from the alphabet so it creates a 5x5 square
Same row move by one to the right
Same column move by one down
Same row and column letter is appended by filler, treat the same
Different row and column create a rectangle/square, enciphering to opposing edges on horizontal axis
Shift an alphabet by a given number right or left encipher to the same position
Choose a unique sequence for each character occurrence
Replace all characters by chosen sequences
